message: ***Collecting Intel***
Please do not give chocolates to doves. It may kill them.
Coo, coo! Secrets of Lady Semiramis, Part 1: She needs a sleeping mask to fall asleep.
The scientific name for cacao is "Theobroma cacao," which is said to mean "food of the gods."
In an enlightened civilization, cacao beans were said to have been used as currency.
Backspear's back, all right!?
They want it that way.
Hoes seem to suit these Lancers better than spears. They're working hard.
A jaguar's shadow can be seen lurking about, glaring at the Hanging Gardens from afar. Consider building an electric fence.
An old bearded Rider who once brought cacao beans back to his homeland is watching the garden and smirking.
Accident report: A giant cacao bean has fallen on the old bearded Rider's head. Sent straight to the infirmary.
A certain nurse took an interest in the medicinal properties of cacao seeds... She has been testing their sedative effects by delivering them to subjects in a closed fist via blunt force trauma.
The Hanging Gardens now has a waterway, which maintains the throne room at a chilly 15℃.
Ingesting cacao beans without processing them into chocolates is strictly forbidden by Hanging Gardens regulations.
There is rumored to be a wonderful secret hidden within the chocolate fountain beside the throne.
Bunyan confesses that she can't bring herself to cut down the cacao trees. Incoming identity crisis...
The young Servants watched a movie featuring chocolate and are now traumatized. They are frightened of blueberries now.
Papers bearing the message, "When you think cacao, of COURSE you think jaguar, meow!?" are being delivered to the garden every day.
A group of Mini Paracels have gathered and are discussing something in secret. This cannot end well...
Mini Paracels are early risers.
It appears that a Roman is buying out all the chocolate. To quote the emperor, "All chocolates lead to Rome."
The old bearded Rider has awoken in the infirmary. His first words: "Who am I?"
Paracelsus: "I've created a medicine from cacao that relieves fatigue. Would you like to try?"
Mini Paracel: "C7H8N402...C8H10N402..."
The witch Gunnhild, who was relieved to hear about Chaldea's chocolate shortage, begins sending letters (Read: curses) protesting the new cacao production.
Unable to ignore the current suspicious activity, Mr. Jekyll has decided to monitor the operation, under the guise of serving as an assistant.
The company selling unauthorized Mini Paracels has been exposed. Possible involvement on the part of Caesar Co.?
The poisonous girl appears to be doing maintenance on Mini Paracels for free at night.
Coo, coo! Secrets of Lady Semiramis, Part 2: She gives names to doves who do a good job.
Karna and Arjuna have been spotted reenacting the dance moves from a certain chocolate movie.
Mini Paracels have been spotted getting friendly with the poisonous girl.
The Roman dictator and female pharaoh have been seen lovingly feeding each other chocolates.
"Edison and the Chocolate Factory" is hitting the big screen. The leading child actors will be Hans and Shuten.
Reported sightings of a mysterious creature shouting "Nobunobu!" It appears it's being used as a form of labor.
Be on alert for children stealing chocolate. Be on the lookout for horns, books, and cries of "Dismember!"
The old bearded Rider with amnesia has gotten work in the factory. It seems he enjoys slow and steady work.
Miss Frankenstein is frequently seen curling up on the floor of the factory. She seems to find it cozy.
"Is this...a mechanical device that repeats the same tasks infinitely...?" (The mechanical ninja looks concerned.)
Mini Paracel has been promoted to factory head.
A diabolical swap occurred in which finished chocolates were switched with bouillon cubes. Each factory manager blames the other.
What? Mini Paracel is evolving!
Coo, coo? Secrets of Lady Semiramis, Part 3: She doesn't like hot weather.
Boudica from Chaldea's kitchen mentioned that the factory-made chocolate may be a formidable secret ingredient for curry.
Subspecies such as White Chocogolem, Almond Chocogolem, and Wheat Puff Chocogolem have been successfully developed.
Development of Whiskey Bonbon Chocogolem has been halted due to its unstable behavior, including inexplicable activity and giddiness.
Mechanization of the mysterious creatures crying "Nobunobu!" has been confirmed. Experts are currently deliberating what it means to say something is alive.
Announcement: A new guard has been hired in the form of a drill-toting man who claims to be a dentist. Child chocolate thievery has declined sharply.
The old bearded Rider seems to be triggered by something about the golems, who only do what they are told.
"Labor...labor...ungh, my head..." (Old bearded Rider)
Somebody built a small shack at the corner of the factory for Miss Fran. Some may see this as problematic, as it resembles a doghouse. However, Miss Fran seems to like it.
According to the golem operation manual, they are relatively vulnerable to heat. Please keep them away from individuals who breathes fire, are themselves covered in flames, etc.
The Amazones CEO is pitching a collaboration with our chocolate products, focusing on their stable and innovative supply chain.
There's a rumor going around that Chocogolems are delicious.
Be mindful that there is a company selling konpeitou candies as Octuplet Crystals.
Lip gleefully punches Chocogolems with incredible form. "Even I can cook with this!"
Coo, coo! Secrets of ???: Currently destroying the barrier with all their might!
The wine-loving oni is requesting that development of the Whiskey Bonbon Chocogolem be resumed.
Mr. Charles Babbage insists that a third alternative to AC and DC should also be used. Approved.
A set list for the next garden concert was delivered from the rose emperor.
A set list for the next garden concert was delivered from the master of Castle Csejte.
Ryutan employs "Free of Worldly Thoughts" to harvest cacao. "Anything is possible."
Remote-controlled robots have been used to attempt to harvest Chocomandrakes; however, they immediately dissolve when removed from the soil. It appears they must be harvested by humans.
The old bearded Rider accidentally walked through the harvesting ritual site without earplugs and fell unconscious.
The sinister gentleman half-jokingly requested the Avenger wolf's assistance with harvesting. The wolf bit him in the butt.
The creature that cries "nobunobu" was found collapsed in the field with just a stem in one hand, apparently after harvesting choco plants without permission. It was revived with hot water.
IyyaaaAAA! (The Chocomandrake's scream... Recording its voice diminishes the damaging effect. Weaponizing the voice is not possible.)
Mass harvesting is now possible thanks to a new weapon called "Dongyu." The engineer is having stomach trouble, though.
U-harvest campaign...eat as many as you want on the spot! With live a cappella concerts! Please note that participants will need to sign a waiver before beginning.
The Castle Csejte concert was canceled two minutes prior to its start. The only explanation given was, "Because the curry was spicy."
Coocoocoocoo! Secrets of ???: A pickax that was used to build the Hanging Gardens has been summoned. The barrier will be broken.

The giant snake that the kunoichi Servant controls is proving successful at harvesting Chocomandrakes. Is it because snakes can't hear? And does the snake somehow fulfill the condition of harvesting them by human hands?
According to rumor, the spirits of deceased chocolates wander about in the dead of night.
A shadow carrying the Spiritual World Communicator was seen wandering the research lab, muttering, "chocolate Mahatma..."
A high quality chocolate bribe was given to a goddess who was about to head to a meeting to determine the underworld's stance on current chocolate production.
The new receptionist for the laboratory, Miss Abigail, is growing extremely popular.
Hassan of the Hundred Personas (contract worker), who can do the work of a hundred people, was rewarded with chocolate from the research lab.
The famous confectionary of the research lab, Slimy Slimy☆Sea Fiend Choco (12 count), is now on sale at a special discount.
An excerpt from the FAQ regarding the Sea Fiend Choco: "Q: Why does it look like it wriggles?" "A: That's just your imagination."
Pay no heed to the baseless rumor that chocolates disappear in the presence of Baptism Rite.
Miss Gorgon was spotted taking a nap under the floorboards in the research lab. It appears she likes the cold and ominous atmosphere.
At the research lab, only chocolates resurrected through 100% pure Necrochocomancy are used. They are not made with any of the following: blood, curses, heretical gods, or aphrodisiacs.
Edison's latest movie, "Dawn of the Living Choco," was a box office flop. His next film, "The Toxic Chocovenger," may be scrapped.
Coo poh poh. Secrets of Lady Semiramis, Part 4: She doesn't mind wearing a swimsuit. (Shameless self-promotion)
In response to Edison's new chocolate movie, Tesla has been quoted as saying, "Frankly, I don't give a damn. He's terribly misusing the power of thunder and lightning."
From the Chaldea commissary: HUGE sale on plain chocolates for Servants!
The Empress greatly appreciates works of art made from chocolate. They say that her room is decorated with chocolate portraits and statues.
Never before seen chocolate dishes have been added to Chaldea's cafeteria menu. They claim that it's not to get rid of the excessive chocolate stock, but to explore more menu options.

"Eh? I was asked here for my tremendous skill in puzzle games, to help rearrange the machinery to fit into the smallest space possible, right? Not for my ability to manage a dirty room, right? RIGHT!?" (Bat princess)
The old bearded Rider awoke in the infirmary. He was later spotted staggering around, muttering, "I was about...to remember something...I need to go...somewhere..."
Development of new equipment, Spiritron Dress, and Craft Essences using the specially processed chocolate is currently being explored.
A number of combat enthusiasts are excited about trying the Hyperbolic Choco Chamber, believing that by bringing chocolate weapons, they may be able to train for extended periods.
"Missy...no more chocolates...urp. Seriously, don't punch my stomach right now! At least do it to my shell...my shell!"
"Sita...one of these days, I know I'll get a chocolate from you..."

The third installment of the popular chocolate containing prizes, "○○tolfo," is now available. There are five types of prizes, including "Eatolfo," "Restolfo," and the highly requested "Bathing Tolfo," plus two secrets!
The avant-garde science fiction novel "Do Chocolates Dream of Strawberry Sheep," written by Edward T., is amazing! Listed as number one in book sales.
Coo poh poh! Secrets of ???: Hope is good. It can never be destroyed. (While crawling through the chocolate waterway.)
It appears that a certain seeker of vengeance has destroyed a room because he didn't like something about it.
The Chocolate-Type spaceship's aerodynamics have engineers puzzled. X Alter's comment: "Can't all sweets fly?"
A composite matter that doesn't exist on Earth has been extracted from Space Chocolate, but the Empress sees no problem with it because it is delicious.
The combination of chocolate and Japanese sweets has satisfied X Alter. She has been referring to it as a cultural exchange of flavors.
Free tours of the Chocolate-Type spaceship are available. Each tour includes a souvenir Space Chocolate cut from the ship itself.
"Sightseeing destinations on Planet Totooine? Desert. Other places of interest? ...Just desert."

"There are of course planets in the Universe that use chocolate mines as their primary industry. The planets are so popular, they are always danger zones because they're constantly a target for colonization."
"I'm not asking whether they're chocolate or not. What I'm asking is whether they are Sabers or not."
Empress Semiramis is planning on creating a constellation called "Chocolate" to reward space and its many achievements.
"That's right...I need to go...to uncharted territory!" The old bearded Rider was witnessed stowing away on X Alter's spaceship.

Analysis of the luminescence pattern of the mysterious mold that was stuck on the chocolate spaceship has yielded the following message:  "...Habitable...discovered...sending coordinates...back to homeland..."
"If you really want chocolate that much, I can make the sea of SE.RA.PH into chocolate. Aww, Senpai, you're like an ant☆" BB's propensity to tease is a cosmos unto itself.
Coo po po! Secrets of Lady Semiramis, Part 5: The lady laments that, "Artificial flowers are nice, because they will not wither in my hands..."
Helena Blavatsky doesn't seem to show much interest in Space Chocolate. "Ummm, that doesn't seem very Mahatma, you know."
Rumor has it that the great pharaoh is planning to dock a chocolate spaceship with his pyramid.
The Mage of Flowers, who grew tired of the overpowering scent of chocolate, accidently blurted, "Let me tell you about chocolates." Following this, he gave a two hour lecture about chocolate.
Scáthach came up with a unique training program for her disciples after seeing the endless flow of chocolate. No deaths have yet been reported.
Perhaps because the stick got a taste of the thrill, it lies on the ground, muttering, "Prisma☆Carmilla...no, maybe even Prisma☆Raikou..."

The great communal bath in Chaldea has been filled with liquid chocolate. Upon investigation, it has been determined that this was caused by water pipes buckling under the pressure from so many chocolates, rather than as a result of a witch's new beauty regime.
With the ever-increasing amount of chocolate rain, sales of iron umbrellas have skyrocketed.

The facilities team that is focusing on reinforcing the wall against the overwhelming pressure of so much chocolate, and the prideful King of Sparta who focuses on single-target defense, confront each other.
Beware of the Hanging Gardens' new sightseeing spot, the bottomless chocolate pit.

Nobody has ever witnessed the Empress wielding the Jeweled Sword Chocoretch. The ritual is strictly done in the privacy of her highly secure room, and the chocolates are transported to a different location.
Rumor has it that a space pirate is wreaking havoc on the planet of the Moldy Chocolate Aliens, who once planned on invading Earth.
Before the cause can even be investigated properly, more and more chocolate keeps arriving...
Reality itself is buckling under the weight of all this chocolate.
Ishtar, who came to steal the Jeweled Sword, was swept away by a chocolate wave.
Po coo-po. Secrets of Lady Semiramis, Part 6: Don't feel too sorry for her. She actually can pick flowers without them wilting.
Coo coopo. Secrets of ???: ...! (←Pushed back to the starting point when chocolate started to flood the waterway.)
"Hahaha. Chocolate, is it? Even I think we're getting too much. Isn't it going to be a problem if we leave it alone?" (Persian Archer)
Choco Grail-kun occasionally expels what appears to be a knife from his mouth. Since it is also chocolate, it does not appear to be dangerous.
Choco Grail-kun: "I don't care about love. Just eat."
"Curse the Holy Grail!" Handsome man cries chocolate tears.
The calamity of liquid chocolate flooding everywhere has been dubbed "The Chocolate Tide." A new team is attempting to create countermeasures.
The treacherous, swimsuited knight has begun wondering if she can surf chocolate waves.
As the chocolate closes over his head, the seeker of vengeance cries, "I will not hear another story of love, not ever again!"
Some Servants have attempted unleashing their Anti-Army Noble Phantasms at the onrushing flow of chocolate, to no avail.
Class 1 Alert, alarm code X-99: "Possible total destruction of Chaldea facilities at the hands of a joke-level threat. Repeat..."

The old bearded Rider has returned to Earth without notice. His memory returned following his adventure, and he laments that, "I don't have any souvenirs to bring back. If only the Moldy Chocolate Aliens weren't like that..."
An assassination attempt was enacted against Choco Grail-kun. It failed.
A mysterious masked priest finishes his Holy Grail parfait before politely saying, "A product like this can hardly be called omnipotent."
Coo popo. Secrets of New Lady Semiramis: I love chocolate.
Why won't Seal Thirteen begin the decision against Choco Grail-kun?
***Withdrawing***
Be careful of forgotten chocolates.
Valentine's Day continues until you reach home.
Discarding chocolates is prohibited by law.
A dove who saw its mistress's ■■■ face upon return from her midnight stroll has mysteriously disappeared.
Prediction: The girls will still be in love next year.
***Collecting Intel***
This is Arctic Summer World's automatic news service, ready to bring you ongoing, timely updates.
There are no penguins in the Arctic Circle. We repeat, there are no penguins in the Arctic Circle.
Polar bears live in the North Pole. Penguins live in the South Pole.
Arctic Summer World is pleased to welcome all our visitors from Chaldea.
The Backspear Boys will be taking over management of Flower Park during Lady Avalon's absence. When asked for comment, Lord Vlad said, "I hope to leave this garden more beautiful than I found it."
With no more enemies spawning, Flower Park's visitors grow in number by the day.
With the disturbance in Flower Park over, Madam Beni has opened a new yakisoba food stand.
Georgios and Medb have photographed napping polar bear cubs. Medb was so taken that she could only say "Too cute..." for the rest of the day.
Emiya has opened a new crepe food stand that is proving extremely popular among female park visitors.
Bunyan and Romulus have decided to join Flower Park's staff. When asked for comment, members of the Backspear Boys said, "One can never have too many helping hands."
Rumor has it that walking bulbs and trees have been spotted around the Flower Park once again.

Madam Beni's yakisoba stand is hot, hot, hot in more ways than one! Thanks to word of mouth, she has Servants and animals alike lining up for noodles. Modest as always, Madam Beni insisted, "It's just normal yakisoba, chirp."
By sheer coincidence, Hassan of the Serenity has discovered a toxic flower, which may be a Phantasmal rather than a normal plant.
While visiting Flower Park with Koyanskaya of Light and Dark, Nikitich tried a chocolate crepe from a food stand and was blown away, saying, quote, "Yummy!"

In response to a resurgence of tree enemies, the Backspear Boys have put together three elimination squadrons rumored to be led by Gawain, Cú Chulainn Alter, and Charlemagne, respectively. Some critics say this response is "like bringing a bazooka to a knife fight."
Many new hostile trees have been sighted. Could Lady Avalon's nutrient tonic be to blame?
Long, winding lines continue to form at the yakisoba stand. "I just wanted to contribute something to Flower Park, chirp..." said a wistful Madam Beni.
Nursery Rhyme has been seen holding story time with numerous polar bear cubs.
In a surprising turn of events, what appear to be penguins have been seen swimming in Flower Park's brooks. It seems that they are part of Lambdaryllis's entourage.
Amor, the goddess of love, has expressed strong dissatisfaction with the decision to suspend the food court's super spicy menu.

A park visitor by the name of Taira-no-Kagekiyo was the first to complete the newly adjusted Titanic Eight-Boat Leap attraction. Critics say the attraction gives Yoshitsune-types favorable treatment, but the area manager disagrees.
In response to a frequent query, a new FAQ item has been added: "The Santa Maria does not count as a pirate ship."
The attractions have seen moderate success thanks to their newly relaxed difficulty settings. Only Ms. Vritra seems dissatisfied.
Park visitors have reported hearing panicked shouts of "Heracles! Save me, Heracleees!" coming from The Adventure of the Argo during peak hours.
Super spicy food offerings have returned to the food court as part of a secret menu. The goddess of love is reportedly pleased with this turn of events.
An anonymous Rider has claimed they have reached a point where they actually enjoy being put through wringer that is The Titanic Eight-Boat Leap attraction.

A mysterious bearded adventurer carrying an abacus has been seen around, saying, "If the people demand it, I'm willing to let the Santa Maria be part of the pirate attraction. Now, about the contract fee..."
A surprising number of tacticians and strategists have begun visiting the attraction in order to train in naval warfare.
Park visitors are free to choose any Nemo Series avatar they like, but please note that the Nemo Series will not answer questions about which is the most popular.
Madam Beni's additions to the new Red Hot Menu (including adjustable spice levels) are proving to be a sleeper hit with park visitors.
To celebrate his accomplishment as the latest to complete The Titanic Eight-Boat Leap, a picture of Mandricardo looking both sheepish and proud has been hung up near the attraction.
The Santa Maria's Stats:　Anti-Ship Firepower: C　Treasure Discovery: S　Passive Skill: Enables the owner to (via coercion) trade glass beads for genuine valuables.
We are pleased to announce a new nighttime event, the Electric Parade. Showings will begin once the showrunners decide whether to use direct current or alternating current.
Captain Jason continues to ignore questions about whether or not Medea qualifies as an Argonaut.

Formerly a hot springs facility, Hawaiian Genji has recently reopened for business as a tropical resort and water park. Head Manager Minamoto-no-Raikou has said, "I would love for Hawaiian Genji to become a 'hip kids hangout.'"

Sei Shounagon has been arrested for pouring gallons of soap down the water slide. When pressed for comment, Sei appeared regretful, saying, "I thought a giant bubble bath would get the emotions flowing."
Don't miss out on North Pole Kaiju Uji Kintoki Shaved Ice, the summer's simultaneously hottest AND coldest treat! Take it from Odysseus, who hails it as, "exceptionally well-chilled."

As of today, Mysterious Heroine X Alter's Galaxy Cream Shiratama Zenzai Pool is officially open to the general public. However, many customers remain unsure as to what exactly a "shiratama zenzai pool" even is.

Today, Murasaki Shikibu will be holding public readings for her latest book, "The Tale of the North Pole." Modest as ever, Murasaki claims that it is a lighthearted story inspired by many other works.
Multiple eyewitnesses have reported seeing a large, stark-naked man on the roof. According to park management, this is likely Ashiya Douman following the theft of his yukata by persons unknown.

Sei Shounagon has been arrested for releasing large school of salmon down the water slide. When pressed for comment, Sei appeared regretful, saying, "I wanted to snap some pics of polar bears holding them in their mouths."

Anastasian Ice Cream has just opened a new branch in the North Pole. Competition with its rival, North Pole Shaved Ice, has been fierce, with Noble Phantasms flying in fast and furious bids to draw customers' attention.

Today, the Shinsengumi experienced both a jacuzzi and a jet pool for the first time. Other customers making use of these features all smiled upon hearing the group's merrily furious screams echoing throughout the park.

Murasaki Shikibu's "The Tale of the North Pole" has received mixed reviews. In particular, there have been reports of children breaking into inconsolable crying fits following a scene in which the canine characters Taromaru and Jiromaru have their faces split open like overripe fruit.
A masked prowler was seen rescuing a female park visitor from drowning. Pressed for comment, one visitor replied, "I think that might have been this year's Oni Cure."

Sei Shounagon has been arrested for pouring hundreds of pounds of soumen noodles down the water slide. When pressed for comment, a female colleague of Sei's angrily said, "She obviously doesn't regret what she's done at all!"
North Pole Shaved Ice and Anastasian Ice Cream have reached a historic accord, and agreed to collaborate on a new joint venture product they call North Pole Anastasia Sweet Buns.

During what onlookers presumed to be one of her regular inspections, Scáthach-Skadi was seen today enjoying a bowl of shaved ice. When pressed for comment, Skadi denied these claims, insisting that "They must have confused me for Lancer Scáthach."
Suzuka Gozen arrived at the North Pole excited for a dip in the hot springs, only to be disappointed when she learned the springs had been remodeled into a water park.

Fun Fact: Today, Scáthach-Skadi shared that her original vision for the Demonic Ice Castle was for it to be a mobile shopping mall and food court that would always be cooled to just the right temperature.

The impromptu superhero show recently held in front of the castle gates has been such a big hit with park visitors, especially children, that the Queen of Sheba has volunteered to sponsor it as a regular event.

The recipe for the Demonic Ice Castle food court's legendary hot dog is rumored to have leaked. Amazones.com, Caesar, and the Queen of Sheba are all offering rewards to anyone who can bring it to them.
Fun Fact: The Demonic Ice Castle is both impervious to melting, and not sticky when touched.
Signs point to playing superheroes becoming the new hot trend among polar bear cubs, seabird chicks, and childlike Servants.

Scáthach-Skadi initially claimed that she was "perfectly fine" and that "the doctors are free to go," only to collapse again immediately following her announcement. Eyewitness reports claimed she had tears in her eyes upon seeing Asclepius take out his giant syringe and Nightingale's Assault Medicine.
The smash hit superhero show playing at the castle gates has entered its second season. Who could the new villains, Undead Dragon Hero and Mourning Bride, secretly be!?

Having come into the legendary hot dog recipe by sheer luck, Chaldea director Goredolf Musik has decided to open his own hot dog stand near the castle gates. When pressed for comment, Musik responded, "Wait, what's this now? Why are we opening a food stand when we have a mission to complete!?"
It was revealed today that shaved ice made from the Demonic Ice Castle does not melt, period. Blackbeard learned this the hard way.

Hero goods, or rather, Heroine XX goods, have been flying off the shelves. However, rumor has it that their seller, the Queen of Sheba, has been pocketing all the profits thanks to Heroine XX not demanding a cut of product sales in her contract.

Madam Beni opened a new food stand in the castle gate plaza today, only for it to once again be immediately thronged by customers forming long, winding lines. She also declared she would "close the stand during hero show showtimes, chirp." Commentators believe this decision is meant to keep the show area free of unsightly foot traffic during peak hours.

Dramatic tension in the castle plaza superhero show has reached its peak. The key word symbolizing Heroine XX's new power is "pommel horse." Undead monsters howl as they are summoned by villain of the week Queen of the Heavens and the Underworld, while the guardian in white descends upon the plaza with a flourish!

The new food stand's hot dogs were an instant hit. Having achieved incredible culinary success, Director Goredolf has decided to return to the ice-top cruise ship, leaving the stand in Boudica and Circe's hands.
Circe has succeeded in transforming the Demonic Ice Castle's ice into kykeon. However, while this kykeon will no longer give you a terrible stomachache, it WILL turn you into a pig.
Heroine XX has agreed to become a spokeswoman for North Pole Anastasia Manjyu. This time, she made sure to negotiate a cut of sales into her contract.
There are actually numerous chicken kept in this area. We suggest using their blood for writing talismans, and their meat for frying.
Be very wary of the Hassan Servants currently visiting, especially their most frightening attraction, Old Man of the Mountain.
Taoist wooden swords are made from peach trees and can purge evil wherever they find it.
Clytie "Sunflower Head" van Gogh has been hired on as the newest part-timer.
Some people say that jiāngshī were originally created as a way to get the bodies of workers who had traveled far away to earn money for their families sent back to their home on mainland China.
Many local chickens have escaped. The jiāngshī Torturers are currently hop—er, hot on their heels in pursuit.
The jiāngshī Torturers are actually perfectly capable of walking like normal, but they choose to hop around so as not to anger their empress.
There is a surprisingly wide variety of kinds of talisman. The ones used on the jiāngshī Torturers' heads are a Wu Zetian-original creation.
Brainwashing chants are forbidden on the premises.

Super Orion wasn't afraid to set foot in the haunted house, declaring that he was "fine with ghost girls as long as they're hot." On realizing that he was in a house of infinite mirrors, each of which reflected an angry Artemis, he immediately changed his tune.
A firm believer in fair pay for fair work, Wu Zetian has agreed to pay Taisui Xingjun, who was just napping nearby, a usage fee for BGC (background curses).
Hessian has been steadily advancing his career. He has recently been promoted to the top of the headless monster group, where he now earns ten times his original salary.
Once she learned it was legal for her to hold hands with her sister in this location, Trưng Nhị's expression changed both immediately and dramatically.
Martha! Refrain from further use of Jacob's Limbs, please!
There are all sorts of frights and terrors to experience in this area, but for some reason, the manager has personally outlawed anything even remotely related to cats.

Gespenst Ketzer always submits her drafts at the eleventh hour. She insists that "I made it on time, so what's the (expletive) problem?" This has proved insufficient justification to spare her a lecture from Martha.
Jeanne d'Arc's club, St. Orleans, is in the middle of a rare slump. She and her partner, Marie, appear to be stuck on the philosophical question, "What IS true love, anyway?"

Sancho has decided to distribute a book she'll call "The Secret Adventures of Don Quixote de la Mancha," which will include some choice episodes that didn't make the original book's cut. She is currently in the midst of a furious yet delightful writing spree.
Due to this convention's smaller scale, staff has been pared back to a minimum as well, with only Leonidas and two others managing security.

Xu Fu has decided to distribute the recipe for the elixir of immortality. However, some early readers have expressed doubts that such...haphazard ingredients and collection methods could really result in actual immortality.

Gespenst Ketzer has dragged Master into an impromptu meeting to discuss their next collaborative work. She has also ordered a chocolate parfait and appears to be enjoying it immensely. "What, you want a bite? Fine, whatever. Guess I can spare some. No? You don't? Just shut your freakin' mouth and accept my generosity, dammit."

St. Orleans decided to ask Sigurd and Brynhild their thoughts, but their answer was rather more on the bloody side than they would have liked. Their next port of call was Siegfried and Kriemhild. Unfortunately, merely asking the question prompted Kriemhild to shriek and attack them. Obviously, this was not particularly helpful, either.

"The Secret Adventures of Don Quixote de la Mancha" has become so popular, fans have begun clamoring for a sequel, which prompted Sancho to immediately begin work on a video series and comic adaptation. It seems a new, virtual Don Quixote has been born.
Leonidas had a stunning realization: If three people each work as hard as a hundred, isn't that equivalent to three hundred people working at once? He has finally discovered mathematics.

Jing Ke was going to distribute a book she called "The Assassin's How-To Manual," but was quickly stopped because apparently an assassin isn't meant to reveal their tricks. Thoroughly convinced of this, she decided to change gears and publish reviews of her favorite liquor. However, this also proved less than useful for readers, since very nearly every drink reviewed received five out of five stars.

Gespenst Ketzer has been seen visiting the hot springs spa, getting a deep-tissue massage, and otherwise partaking in worldly pleasures alongside her usual crew of assistants. But don't worry, she's absolutely going to get started on her next book once she's done!

For the time being, St. Orleans decided to make a new book based on their own idea of true love. It was fairly well-received, but when asked if the story demonstrated true love, no reader was able to come up with an answer. "Do romantic comedies really need to prominently feature an enormous ballista?" "Absolutely!"

The virtual Don Quixote has responded to a heckler by challenging the person in question to a duel. To everyone's surprise, the heckler accepted and wiped the floor with him, creating quite a stir. True to his word, Don Quixote retired, and Sancho decided to retire along with him. The book she left behind is expected to go down in history as a rare and legendary work of fiction.
I'll be damned. The three of them actually did it.

Medb began a new live streaming show she called "I Made It With Honey." Her provocative, uninhibited remarks helped the show quickly build a large audience, but it all came to an end when she suddenly declared, "I'm tired of this now," and decided to quit on the spot.
Now that the Holy Grail has been collected, Arctic Summer World will soon be closing its doors forever. Scáthach-Skadi has expressed her sincere gratitude to everyone who came to visit.

Having been sealed away into a jar once again, Ashiya Douman has revealed that he left a curse in each of the park's seven areas. Kiichi Hogen suggested just forgetting about them, but changed her mind when a passing Taigong Wang said, "Yeah...that doesn't sound like a great idea."
Recent rumors claim the Arctic Tower's sun is actually a conceptual sun, not a physical one. Several Casters have been investigating it, and are expected to make their report soon.

Ibuki-Douji has begun calling herself "the midsummer cheerleading squad." She was most recently seen cheering on Kōnstantînos XI as he hung his head in shame before other old guard Roman Heroic Spirits.

The animals who came to visit the park are all leaving to parts unknown. They probably won't remember this place even once humanity has been restored. But maybe, just maybe, they'll remember bits and pieces of a wonderfully fun dream...
*** Information Gathering Shutdown ***
Arctic Summer World is closing its doors. Thank you for being part of it while it lasted.
We hope you'll enjoy your time here next summer as well.
Don't let the summer heat get to you!
Remember to stay hydrated!
